data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Guidimaka, Mauritania who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guidimaka, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 269 believers living in the state of Guidimaka. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Guidimaka, Mauritania.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Guidimaka to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, I pray that the Zenaga people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Zenaga people know you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Guidimaka, Mauritania. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Guidimaka, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guidimaka, Mauritania has a population of 219,700.

We estimate Guidimaka has 269 people who might know Jesus, 336 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 219,096 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 816 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 269 believers in Guidimaka to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 219,432 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

location.name: Guidimaka
location.people_groups_list: Masna, Nemadi, Bedouin, Berabish, Soninke, Fulani, Pulaar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Masna (2,700), Nemadi (500), Bedouin, Berabish (68,000), Soninke (237,000), Fulani, Pulaar (239,000)
